data.title: See the Hypnos Pillowtop Elite at Barnes & Fadden Ltd.
data.meta_description: Visit a Barnes & Fadden showroom today to see our collection of "The most comfortable beds in the world" you could ever wish to own - the Hypnos Pillowtop Elite
data.text:
The Pillow-top Elite mattress is the epitome of sleep comfort and is made with the finest natural and sustainable fibres. Handcrafted and upholstered with layers of soft Solotex™, the mattress contains up to two fleeces of British wool that is both traceable and certified.

The mattress 'pillow-top' has Adaptiv™ comfort springs and a responsive natural Talalay latex layer, whilst the mattress features the Hypnos ReActivePro™ 6 pocket spring system, where each spring has 6 active turns to independently sense your shape and weight distribution.

The unique Hypnos Triple Edge Protection™ is also incorporated to provide true edge-to-edge support allowing full use of the whole sleep surface, and features three rows of hand side-stitching for a smartly tailored appearance.

The signature Hypnos God of Sleep woven chemical-free cover on the mattress is made from responsibly sourced cotton infused with a treatment derived from natural extracts to help regulate body sleeping temperature (37.5 technology) and conforms to the UK's strict fire retardancy standards.

You will never own a more comfortable and beautiful bed.

Medium comfort level only

Quality Assurance Guarantee

To Guarantee Quality Assurance, we DO NOT offer 'sleep trials' due to Hygiene reasons as manufacturers will not accept the return of such used products.

Thus we eliminate any uncertainty our customers may have in receiving such returned items that may be re-packaged as 'new'.

Our Lowest Price Guarantee

Our aim is to ensure that all Barnes & Fadden customers receive not only the best choice, quality and service, but also best value for money.

Should you see an identical Hypnos bed or mattress

advertised online for a lower price, then we will happily match that price upon purchase!
